level.text: All meetings of the Board at which official action of any kind is taken shall be open to the public as required by relevant “sunshine” laws of the District of Columbia. D.C. Code ยง2-531 (2001). No rule, regulation, resolution, or other official action shall be effective unless enacted or taken at an open meeting.
